name: Clearly Walking Game
description:
They're small, they're fragile and they're walking to get there.  Hard surfaces will break them - and they won't risk that - instead they'll stop and ask to be magically whisked away.  Can you help them walk there by placing soft squares on the hard surfaces for them to walk over?

  • Tap a path to place the soft square.
  • Tap a soft square to return it to your stock.
  • You have a limited amount of soft squares, but you can re-use them as often as you like.
  • Keep up as they cross multiple paths and start coming from all directions.

Choose casual or expert mode and switch between them as often as you like:

  • Casual Mode:  They walk slower, 5 walkers can be whisked away.
  • Expert Mode:  They walk faster, 3 walkers can be whisked away.

  • 5 Different walkers who walk at different speeds.
  • 120 Different levels with random elements, so that they'll be slightly different every time you play them.
  • Achieve gold by not having any walkers whisked away.
  • Replay any level as often as you like.

Please see my website for credits
